Reviews.Title: "Interpolated Resolution" means HORRIBLE picture quality.
Reviews.Author: J. Reed "photo guy"
Reviews.Content: Research "interpolated resolution" before considering an SVP camera.  I don't know what SVP thinks they're doing, but my friend bought one of these cameras for $100 and it was a huge mistake.  Due to the images being interpolated, they all come out fuzzy and washed out.  Why waste money when you can get a Nikon Coolpix L18 or an Olympus FE-310 for the same price, with picture quality that blows SVP out of the water?

Reviews.Title: sucked!!
Reviews.Author: Laura Anschutz
Reviews.Content: doesn't work...... put batteries in turned on once and died...... can't reach company for replacement!!

Reviews.Title: Pinhole Camera
Reviews.Author: J. zhu "Tomorrow a better day"
Reviews.Content: Pinhole Camerawell, Look at the lens yourself. This uses a pinhole camera's lens which is very tiny. and I meant it, TINY!!!consider this similar to a low quality webcam. That is the quality you will get. look at the lens before you buy a camera. Conclusion: THIS IS GARBAGE!!!

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: C. A. Lee
Reviews.Content: I think this camera is a great value and takes good pictures.My daughter says the camera is easy to use, takes good pictures, and loves the video feature since you can take long videoss with sound.The removable memory is a great bonus, and is not very expensive.Overall, a fanastic value.

Reviews.Title: love the camera!
Reviews.Author: S. Williams
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in November, and I absolutly love it!!  It has 8x zoom capability, and is the perfect size to take anywhere.  It takes great pictures and I love the video function too.

Reviews.Title: SVP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Douds Jr.
Reviews.Content: AT first glace this product seems to be of quality. Though once I received this product it was horrible.  The buttons are very tacky and seem cheap.  The camera had bad photo storage.  The camera would only even work every other time it seemed.  The biggest complaint is the delay between photos.  The camera has to "CHARGE" between every shot, yea charge I had never seen that before either. I would not recommend this camera to any one. Go with a brand you know and trust. Attempted to return and the company would not even contact me back. Via E-mail or phone.

ProductInfo.Name: SVP DC-12DX-Black 5.1MP Thinnest DIGITAL CAMERA VIDEO w/ SOUND!
